argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvmval.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nvmval.2 | |- G = ( +v ` U ) |
| 3 |  | nvmval.4 | |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) |
| 4 |  | nvmval.3 | |- M = ( -v ` U ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_nvmval | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A M B ) = ( A G ( -u 1 S B ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_neg1cn | |- -u 1 e. CC |
| 7 | 1, 3 | #P_nvscl | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ -u 1 e. CC /\ B e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S B ) e. X ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_mp3an2 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ B e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S B ) e. X ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S B ) e. X ) |
| 10 | 1, 2 | #P_nvcom | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ ( -u 1 S B ) e. X ) -> ( A G ( -u 1 S B ) ) = ( ( -u 1 S B ) G A ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syld3an3 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A G ( -u 1 S B ) ) = ( ( -u 1 S B ) G A ) ) |
| 12 | 5, 11 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A M B ) = ( ( -u 1 S B ) G A ) ) |
